name: Hammer Brothers VS
description:
Simple fan game based on hammer brothers from Super Mario for 2 players local.

Player 1:
W = jump
A/D = movement
S = go down the platform
F = shoot

Player 2:
Arrow Keys: movement, jump, descend platform
Numpad 0: shoot

First to 10 hit wins!

Assets from DotStudio: https://dotstudio.itch.io/super-mario-1-remade-assets

Music from Super Mario Brothers 3
